children.text: Top Up using UPI & Debit Card
Withdraw wallet balance to your own bank account for FREE
To safely verify your mobile number
To offer best deals around you
PhonePe needs permission to send SMS to verify your mobile number, as mandated by NPCI.
PhonePe needs permission to send SMS from your mobile to verify your number, as mandated by NPCI. Kindly turn on the SMS permission.
